product_name: Granite Gear Aji 50 Ki Pack - Women's
long_description: The women's Granite Gear Aji 50 Ki Pack delivers unparalleled access and is ideal for lightweight backpacking, day hiking or travel. Gender-specific Vapor Current suspension comfortably carries up to 35 lbs. "Opening Possibilities" zipper offers easy access to all parts of the main compartment; Ideal(R) Tac zipper with Nanosphere technology is very water resistant. Internal hydration sleeve and ports route feeder tube out of the pack (reservoir sold separately). Large stretch-mesh side and front pockets keep items handy. The Granite Gear Aji 50 Ki Pack features tough Cordura(R) high-tenacity nylon fabric and strong 10mm webbing compression straps to stabilize the load.
short_description: The women's Granite Gear Aji 50 Ki Pack delivers unparalleled access and is ideal for lightweight backpacking, day hiking or travel.
